text: shirk karanevaalon ka kahana hai, "yadi allaah chaahata to usase hatakar kisee cheez kee na ham bandagee karate aur na hamaare baap-daada hee aur na ham usake bina kisee cheez ko avaidh thaharaate." unase pahale ke logon ne bhee aisa hee kiya. to kya saaf-saaf sandesh pahuncha dene ke siva rasoolon par koee aur bhee zimmedaaree hai
